full_output.summary: I love learning new things and am always on the lookout for new opportunities to develop and grow within my role, whether thats learning new skills, taking on a new project or collaborating with other departments.Im a positive person who likes to excel at what I do, and I think the best way to do that is to constantly challenge myself to learn as much as I can and to perform to the best of my abilities every day.

education.school: Guru Nanak Dev institute of technology

projects.name: Arcade-games
projects.description: I tried to build arcade games using html, css, java scripts which includes memory game shooter and tick tac toe among other games.

projects.name: Gym-management-system
projects.description: Built a gym management system using html, css, java script, & bootstrap. It allows the users one stop solution, to manage and browse through all the possible options available as well as choose the desired weight training model. We also have customer reviews on the website for better customer satisfaction.

projects.name: Trading bot
projects.description: Attempted to make a trading bot using bun and typescript. The bot continuously monitors the order books on both exchanges for the specified trading pair. Calculates the best bid and best ask price.

projects.name: real time chat module
projects.description: Developed in Node.js with WebSocket, this simple chat application enables users to join custom rooms, send messages, and upvote content. Admins can create rooms, set properties, and receive alerts when messages exceed upvote thresholds, fostering interactive and organized real-time communication.
